title: Bills Make a Statement on Opening Night
description:
Nora, Ben, and Steven discuss the Bills' dominant 31-10 win over the Rams. They discuss Josh Allen’s impressive performance, the Rams defense, Matthew Stafford’s arm, and more.

Hosts: Nora Princiotti Ben Solak, and Steven Ruiz
Associate Producer: Isaiah Blakely
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal and Conor Nevins
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
